Text.Name: PlayerName
Text.OnTextChanged: Parent.DoCommand.onshow=('hide_window MainHUD.StartButton.AutoLoad') COND1=(Text=='NoName') COND2=(Text==sName) COND3=(Text=='') COND=(COND1 || COND2 || COND3) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(COND ? false : true) sName=Text

Button.Name: Load
Button.OnShow: show_window MainHUD.StartButton show_window Custom.StatBar_Health show_window Custom.StatBar_Power show_window Custom.StatBar_HealthRegen show_window Custom.StatBar_PowerRegen show_window Custom.StatBar_Mitigation show_window Custom.StatBar_PVPCritMit show_window Custom.StatBar_Toughness show_window Custom.StatBar_Avoidance show_window Custom.StatBar_Strength show_window Custom.StatBar_Agility show_window Custom.StatBar_Stamina show_window Custom.StatBar_Intelligence show_window Custom.StatBar_Wisdom show_window Custom.StatBar_Physical show_window Custom.StatBar_Arcane show_window Custom.StatBar_Noxious show_window Custom.StatBar_Elemental show_window Custom.StatBar_Haste show_window Custom.StatBar_DPS show_window Custom.StatBar_MeleeDA show_window Custom.StatBar_MeleeAE show_window Custom.StatBar_CritChance show_window Custom.StatBar_CritBonus show_window Custom.StatBar_Potency show_window Custom.StatBar_Fervor show_window Custom.StatBar_Resolve show_window Custom.StatBar_Modifier show_window Custom.StatBar_HateMod show_window Custom.StatBar_Accuracy show_window Custom.StatBar_Strikethrough show_window Custom.StatBar_Flurry show_window Custom.StatBar_WDB show_window Custom.StatBar_SpellMA show_window Custom.StatBar_BlockMod show_window Custom.StatBar_CastSpeed show_window Custom.StatBar_ReuseSpeed show_window Custom.StatBar_SpellReuse show_window Custom.StatBar_AbilityDoubleCast show_window Custom.StatBar_RecoverySpeed show_window Custom.StatBar_PrimaryStats show_window Custom.StatBar_SecondaryStats show_window Custom.StatBar_RangedStats show_window Custom.StatBar_RunSpeed show_window Custom.StatBar_Coin show_window Custom.StatBar_XP show_window Custom.StatBar_Debt show_window Custom.StatBar_AAXP show_window Custom.StatBar_TSXP show_window Custom.StatBar_GuildXP show_window Custom.StatBar_Status show_window Custom.StatBar_Time show_window Custom.StatBar_NorrathTime show_window Custom.StatBar_ZoneArea show_window Custom.StatBar_Location show_window Custom.StatBar_FPS show_window Custom.StatBar_Ping show_window Custom.StatBar_PL show_window Custom.StatBar_BPS Parent.LoadCheck.OnTextChanged=Parent.LoadCheck.codeToCopy Visible=false

Text.codeToCopy:
COND1=(Parent.Parent.Name == '_HUD') COND2=(Parent.Parent.StatBar_BPS.Name == 'StatBar_BPS') COND=(COND1 && COND2) Parent.Init.visible=COND ? true : false Visible=COND ? false : true
COND=(Parent.Parent.Name == 'MainHUD') Visible=COND ? false : true
Text.Name: LoadCheck
